import React, { useEffect, useState, useReducer } from 'react' import Rest from '../rest' const baseURL = 'https://mymoney-71935.firebaseio.com/' const { useGet, usePost, useDelete } = Rest(baseURL) const Home = () => { const data = useGet('mes') const [form, setForm] = useState({}) return ( <>
setForm({ date: e.target.value })} />
setForm({ time: e.target.value })} />
) } export default Home
